field.name: id
field.label: Category
field.description: Choose the category which you want to display events

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to display events from. If no categories selected, events from all categories will be displayed

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you want to exclude events from

field.name: location_id
field.label: Location
field.description: Choose the Location which you want to display events

field.name: default_month
field.label: Default Month
field.description: Choose the month you want to display events from. If you don't choose any month, the current month will be used

field.name: default_year
field.label: Default Year
field.description: Enter the year you want to display events from. If you leave this empty, the current year will be used

field.name: hide_past_events
field.label: Hide Past Events
field.description: Choose to show/hide past events for this menu item

field.name: hide_children_events
field.label: Hide Children Events
field.description: Choose to show/hide children events for this menu item

field.name: link_event_to_registration_form
field.label: Link Event To Registration Form
field.description: If set to Yes, click on title of event will redirect users to registration form of the event instead of showing event details page.

field.name: hide_full_events
field.label: Hide Full Events
field.description: If set to Yes, full events won't be displayed in the calendar.

field.name: menu_item_id
field.label: Override Menu Item ID
field.description: If you want the system to use different menu item to generate links from this page, enter ID of that menu item here. In most case, leave it empty

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed above the calendar

field.name: show_month_button
field.label: Show Month Button
field.description: If set to Yes, Month button will be shown to allow users to view events in Monthly Layout

field.name: show_week_button
field.label: Show Week Button
field.description: If set to Yes, Week button will be shown to allow users to view events in Weekly Layout

field.name: show_day_button
field.label: Show Day Button
field.description: If set to Yes, Day button will be shown to allow users to view events in Daily Layout

field.name: show_weekend
field.label: Show Weekends
field.description: Whether to include Saturday/Sunday columns in any of the calendar views

field.name: hidden_days
field.label: Hidden Days
field.description: Choose the days which will be hidden in the calendar

field.name: show_non_current_dates
field.label: Show None Current Dates
field.description: Whether to include events from previous/next month in the current month view

field.name: event_time_format
field.label: Event Time Format
field.description: Determine the format of event time (if it is being displayed)

field.name: slot_min_time
field.label: Slot Min Time
field.description: Determines the first time slot that will be displayed for each day

field.name: slot_max_time
field.label: Slot Max Time
field.description: Determines the last time slot that will be displayed for each day

field.name: title_format_month
field.label: Title Format Month
field.description: Format of the date displayed in title selection in Month view

field.name: title_format_week
field.label: Title Format Week
field.description: Format of the date displayed in title selection in Week view

field.name: day_header_format_week
field.label: Day Header Format Week
field.description: Determines the text that will be displayed on the calendarâ€™s column headings in Week view

field.name: title_format_day
field.label: Title Format Day
field.description: Format of the date displayed in title selection in Day view

field.name: slot_label_format
field.label: Slot Label Format
field.description: Determines the time-text that will be displayed on the vertical axis of the agenda views
